TopicTitle: This should give you a semi-alright presentation of just how small we are...

Articles.Content:
http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/b/b6/Earth%27s_Location_in_the_Universe_%28JPEG%29.jpg

Go here, and zoom in the picture so you can read, Ctrl and + is zoom if its not large enough clicking on it.

Take it slow when reading, the universe is a damn, can\'t even say how big, place! Its shocking.
I\'ll just leave this here...
